review: Have been an Amazon Prime member for two years. Was not aware of how easy it was to benefit from the tv services offered to prime members. The Fire TV Stick was a simple solution to provide more choices for programs, movies and more. Took less than 5 minutes to install.
author: teacher

review: Easy to set up! Works great. A nice addition to our antennae TV.
author: Susan Engel

review: To ship a product without any instructions at all, is bad business. I had to learn by trial and error and still can't do what I want to do. The Amazon Cloud is extremely confusing. I end up with two or three of the same photos on the "All" album and don't know how to assign them to specific albums. When I try to move them, the existing album is not shown. Then, if I create a new album to move to, I end up with two albums of the same name.
author: Ken Bruce

review: love it, it was just what I needed for my kids room
author: Amazon Customer

review: Easy to setup and works great.  The picture (HD) is wonderful.
author: Jack H

review: Easy connect and good wifi range.
author: Milton B
